definition: Dahurian angelica (Angelica dahurica)/root of Dahurian angelica (used in TCM)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
angelica (type of iris)/plant root used in TCM

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the extracting procedure of Radix Angelicae dahuricae.
sentences.chinese: 目的對中藥白芷的提取工藝進行優化。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the chemical components of the essential oil of Angelica dahurica from Bozhou.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究亳白芷的揮發油化學成分。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To provide basis for deep research and development of Chuan Baizhi.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲川白芷地上部分的進一步研究和開發提供依據。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To determine the total content of coumarin in Angelica dahurica.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立川白芷藥材中總香豆素的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study histological characters of the overground parts of Chuanbaizhi.
sentences.chinese: 目的對川白芷地上部分的組織學特徵進行系統研究。

sentences.english: Fertilization requires special attention when growing angelica.
sentences.chinese: 種植白芷要特別加強施肥管理。

sentences.english: Results: The recent progress of study on Coumarin of Angelicae dahuricae were displayed.
sentences.chinese: 結果展示了中藥白芷香豆素類成分的最新研究進展。

definition: root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
Ampelopsis japonica (creeper with root used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
